Learning Style



People learn best in different ways. Some people learn best by watching or when things are written down; others learn best through listening and still others learn best by working with their hands. Everyone uses all three senses of seeing, hearing and touch, but, when it comes to learning, most of us prefer one sense over the others. The sense that we like to use the most tells us our preferred learning style.

Knowing what your preferred learning style is will help you decide which learning strategies will work the best for you.
